title: One for All
body: RIOT you must make players choose hes character before he connected to Lobby (One for All). All of players wants to play his love character, but only one gets what he wanted. i Love when all 5 people choose my beloved character (after Ban list), but it hapends never.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, that's how a voting system works. You may find luck in encouraging others in chat to select your favourite champ, so long as you do so in a positive manner.

Let me know if you have any questions!
